Title: Payroll Management System
Description: Build comprehensive payroll management system including salary calculation, payslip generation, tax deductions, and payroll processing workflow

Title: Expense Management & Approval
Description: Create expense submission, approval workflow, and reimbursement management system for employees

Title: Performance Review System
Description: Implement performance review cycles, goal setting, 360-degree feedback, and performance rating system

Title: Asset Allocation & Tracking
Description: Create asset allocation system to assign and track company assets (laptops, phones, etc.) to employees

Title: Training & Development Management
Description: Build training program management, course assignment, progress tracking, and certification management

Title: Employee Exit Management
Description: Create exit interview process, clearance workflow, asset return tracking, and final settlement calculation

Title: Compliance & Policy Management
Description: Build policy document management, employee acknowledgment tracking, and compliance reporting system

Title: Department & Team Management
Description: Create department hierarchy management, team creation, reporting structure, and org chart visualization

Title: Employee Self-Service Portal Access Control
Description: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for employee portal features and data visibility

Title: Notification Center & Alerts
Description: Build centralized notification system for admin actions, approvals, alerts, and system notifications

Title: Data Backup & Recovery System
Description: Implement automated data backup, recovery procedures, and data retention policies

Title: Audit Trail & Activity Logging
Description: Create comprehensive audit trail system logging all admin actions, data changes, and system events

Title: Bulk Operations Dashboard
Description: Build dashboard for bulk operations (bulk leave approval, bulk attendance marking, bulk notifications)

Title: Custom Field Management
Description: Allow admins to add custom fields to employee profiles, forms, and data collection

Title: Integration Hub & API Management
Description: Create API management system, third-party integrations (Slack, email, calendar), and webhook configuration
